mapper.select: select count(*) from user_article ua left join article a on ua.article_id = a.id where ua.type = 0 and a.access_status = 1 and ua.user_id = #{userId}
select sum(a.word_count) as wordCountTotal from user_article ua left join article a on ua.article_id = a.id where ua.type = 0 and a.access_status = 0 and ua.user_id = #{userId}
select sum(a.like_count) as likeCountTotal from user_article ua left join article a on ua.article_id = a.id where ua.type = 0 and a.access_status = 0 and ua.user_id = #{userId}
